scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible churn prediction model. The actor uses a model inversion attack to infer customer demographics and financial information, violating privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of a publicly available customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A publicly available API for a customer churn prediction model is used by a competitor for a model inversion attack to gain a competitive advantage by reconstructing sensitive customer information.
